body: Not ntr but good asf if u dream it as one. Yoda has spoken
This is so freaking hot, but also fucked up. This is not NTR, but it's dark.
Looks like the MC misunderstood his relationship with the girl. The art is fine.

@Zothany For the story to consider NTR the mc has to like the girl. The girl need to either have feeling or outright crave sex with the bull. Finally, she has to be stolen where the mc convince himself that it impossible to get her back. Here in the story it lack these factor and that why it not NTR. Also, the problem here is everyone just judge the story without understand anything at all because they rely on the tag which you should know by now that nhentai tag can be misleading a lot of time. I just let these people know that it not NTR so they don't get trigger over it. If they still think that way then that their problem.

Then what exactly is NTR? Physically? Mentally? Either of them or both of them? I think it's far beyond what NTR meant at the beginning. Everyone has their own judgment now. And it becomes more confusing if you put the boy's thought and girl's thought together to consider... It's just no need to convince others that it is NTR or not.

Don't comment if you don't understand the story, wait for English translations lol. This ain't NTR. The girl literally said there's no love interest and they are just sex friends. Dude's just surprised because he thought the girl like him but actually she's just overly friendly. No bad feelings here lol
